T02D3034:76a-0: @76a * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3034:76a-1: gang dag gza' rnams kyis zin pa las grol bar
T02D3034:76a-2: 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas
T02D3034:76a-3: / dkyil 'khor snga ma ltar bris la /
T02D3034:76a-4: dkyil 'khor gyi shar phyogs su chu dang khrag dang
T02D3034:76a-5: 'o ma bsres pas snod zangs la sogs pa bkang
T02D3034:76a-6: la / gza' gang gis zin pa'i gzugs bag zan
T02D3034:76a-7: la zhi dkar sa'i phye mas bsres pa la khru
T02D3034:76a-8: gang pa tshon sna tshogs pas ri mo dang /
T02D3034:76a-9: thig ler byas la gzhag go ;
T02D3034:76a-10: / de'i lus rnams ltas ngan sna tshogs pa'i spu dang /
T02D3034:76a-12: smyug ma gtsang ma la gdugs dang /
T02D3034:76a-15: de nas gzugs de chu'i steng du khri byas la dar dmar po'i yol ba bres la gzhag go //
T02D3034:76a-16: dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs mtshams rnams su gtor ma gtsang ma brgyad /
T02D3034:76a-17: spos dang mar me dang bshos dang ldan pa bsham mo //
T02D3034:76a-18: stag pa'am shug pa khru gang ba cig la khram nyi shu rtsa gcig btod la /
T02D3034:76a-19: rma bya'i sgro dang bal tshon dang /
T02D3034:76a-20: dar tshon lnga yis byas pas gzas zin pa'i lus mgo mjug bya ba ste ;
T02D3034:76a-21: chu dang gzugs la bstim mo //
T02D3034:76a-22: sngags pa gtsang sbra ldan pas dmar po'i gos gyon /
T02D3034:76a-23: mgo la dmar po'i thod bcings la /
T02D3034:76a-24: me long lnga btsugs la gza' gang gis zin pa'i
T02D3034:76a-25: snying po la 'bum phrag gcig khram shing la btab
T02D3034:76a-26: la khram phyis byad bkrol shod gtor zhes brjod cing
T02D3034:76a-27: nad pa'i lus la gza'i sgo'i ngos su bya ste
T02D3034:76a-29: gtor ma char gyin gza' la mchod pa dang bstod pa bya /
T02D3034:76a-30: lhag ma bdun po'i snying po la stong phrag re chu la bzlas shing /
T02D3034:76a-31: gzas zin pa'i lus la bya ba bo //
T02D3034:76b-2: de nas 'bru mar dang rtsi mar la sogs pa
T02D3034:76b-3: rnyed tshad la snying po rgyas bsdus gang yang rung
T02D3034:76b-4: ba brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te /
T02D3034:76b-5: nad pa'i lus mgo mjug tu bsku mnye bya'o //
T02D3034:76b-6: de ltar lan gcig las ma grol na gnyis dang gsum dang bdun byas na /
T02D3034:76b-7: gzas zin pa las mi grol mi srid do //
T02D3034:76b-8: de nas chu rungs su bcas pa de rgya mtsho chen po'i gling ngam /
T02D3034:76b-9: ri brgyad 'dus pa'i rtse mo la pi wang la
T02D3034:76b-10: sogs pa'i sgra sna tshogs dang ldan pas bskyal lo
T02D3034:76b-11: // gtor ma brgyad po yang phyogs mtshams ma nor bar gtang /
T02D3034:76b-12: de ltar cho ga rdzogs par byas nas /
T02D3034:76b-13: gzas zin pa la yang gong gi gza' brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur na /
T02D3034:76b-14: dus thams cad du gza' rnams kyi dmag dpon du 'gyur ro //
T02D3034:76b-15: gal te gza' gang gis zin pa'i dus ma phyed na gza' brgyad char gyi gzugs byas la /
T02D3034:76b-16: bsnyen pa 'bum phrag re bskyar la snga ma ltar bya'o //
T02D3034:76b-17: gza'i gdon las grol bar byed pa'i cho ga rin po che grol byed ces bya ba /
